cause.description:
Young America’s Foundation is committed to ensuring that increasing numbers of young Americans understand and are inspired by the ideas of individual freedom, a strong national defense, free enterprise, and traditional values.
1. To provide intellectual balance on campuses.
2. Advance conservative ideas to students across the country.
3. To save and preserve Ronald Reagan's ranch, Rancho del Cielo.
cause.mission: introduce conservative principles to thousands of youth across the country.
cause.name: Young America's Foundation
